013    package net.sf.oval.constraint;
014    
015    import static net.sf.oval.Validator.getCollectionFactory;
016    
017    import java.util.Map;
018    
019    import net.sf.oval.ConstraintTarget;
020    import net.sf.oval.Validator;
021    import net.sf.oval.configuration.annotation.AbstractAnnotationCheck;
022    import net.sf.oval.context.OValContext;
023    
024    /**
025     * @author Sebastian Thomschke
026     */
027    public class LengthCheck extends AbstractAnnotationCheck<Length>
028    {
029            private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
030    
031            private int min;
032            private int max;
033    
034            /**
035             * {@inheritDoc}
036             */
037            @Override
038            public void configure(final Length constraintAnnotation)
039            {
040                    super.configure(constraintAnnotation);
041                    setMax(constraintAnnotation.max());
042                    setMin(constraintAnnotation.min());
043            }
044    
045            /**
046             * {@inheritDoc}
047             */
048            protected ConstraintTarget[] getAppliesToDefault()
049            {
050                    return new ConstraintTarget[]{ConstraintTarget.VALUES};
051            }
052            
053            /**
054             * @return the max
055             */
056            public int getMax()
057            {
058                    return max;
059            }
060    
061            /**
062             * @return the min
063             */
064            public int getMin()
065            {
066                    return min;
067            }
068    
069            /**
070             * {@inheritDoc}
071             */
072            public boolean isSatisfied(final Object validatedObject, final Object valueToValidate, final OValContext context,
073                            final Validator validator)
074            {
075                    if (valueToValidate == null) return true;
076    
077                    final int len = valueToValidate.toString().length();
078                    return len >= min && len <= max;
079            }
080    
081            /**
082             * @param max the max to set
083             */
084            public void setMax(final int max)
085            {
086                    this.max = max;
087                    requireMessageVariablesRecreation();
088            }
089    
090            /**
091             * @param min the min to set
092             */
093            public void setMin(final int min)
094            {
095                    this.min = min;
096                    requireMessageVariablesRecreation();
097            }
098    
099            /**
100             * {@inheritDoc}
101             */
102            @Override
103            public Map<String, String> createMessageVariables()
104            {
105                    final Map<String, String> messageVariables = getCollectionFactory().createMap(2);
106                    messageVariables.put("max", Integer.toString(max));
107                    messageVariables.put("min", Integer.toString(min));
108                    return messageVariables;
109            }
110    }
